title: Nectarine, Stilton and Walnut Salad with a Raspberry Vinaigrette

preparations.content: Place a serving bowl on mixing bowl lid and weigh in salad leaves, cranberries and nectarines. Remove serving bowl and set aside.
Place walnuts in mixing bowl and chop <b>1 sec/speed 6<b>. Transfer to serving bowl and set aside.
Place garlic in mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 9<b>.
Add oil, baslamic vinegar, balsamic raspberry glaze, salt and pepper then blend <b>20 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer to serving bowl and mix together gently.
Crumble Stilton over top of salad before serving.
